hackathon-description-text: What happens in Vegas... changes the travel game. On June 24th and 25th, we're bringing the brightest minds in tech together to face off in a 24-hour hackathon to reinvent travel.
hackathon-eligibility: Individuals (over 18 years in age); Teams (no more than 5 participants per team)
hackathon-requirements: Any technology solution is eligible - build a site, mobile app, use hardware, anything your mind can think of. However, your solution must have a travel focus. Your goal is to build something that has the potential to reinvent travel, you decide what form that takes.
hackathon-rules:
Hackathon:TTX Las Vegas 2017 is a skill contest (the “
”) that will take place in Las Vegas, Nevada from June 24, 2017 to June 25, 2017 (the “
”). 
 
The name of each Prize winner will be announced to all eligible participants after the Contest Period. For a list of winners, participants may send a self-addressed stamped envelope to: Hackathon:TTX 2017, Sabre GLBL Inc., 3150 Sabre Drive, Southlake, TX 76092.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Idea for New Sabre Red Workspace

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Aria, 3730 Las Vegas Fwy, Las Vegas, NV 89109, USA
hackathon-location-address: Aria, 3730 Las Vegas Fwy, Las Vegas, NV 89109, USA
hackathon-description-header: Build on Sabre's platform to create the next big thing in travel.
